t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 2 weeks ago - Apple and L'Oreal are among other gated brands on Amazon.

18 hours ago - Amazon opened its tenth physical bookstore in 2017; media speculation at the time suggested that Amazon planned to eventually roll out 300 to 400 bookstores around the country. All of its locations were closed in 2022 along with other retail locations under the "Amazon 4-Star" brand.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Whisper08 is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: I cancelled Amazon Brand Registry by Clicking 'Close this ...
s: I cancelled Amazon Brand Registry application by Clicking 'Close this Case' to create a new application as I missed selecting relevant categories that my brand will be selling on Amazon. But when I started new application I am getting a message ‘Application for brand E'ALLEY is currently ...

t: How to Remove Items From Amazon Storefront
s: November 22, 2017 - This displays all active product listings on your storefront. Click the "Actions" menu beside the item you want to remove. To remove multiple items at once, click the check box beside each item before you select this menu. Click "Close Listing" to remove the item's listing from your storefront.
Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to become eligible to activate a suite of brand-building tools and protection benefits.

t: Sponsored Brands – Increase brand awareness | Amazon Ads
s: What categories are not eligible for Sponsored Brands? At this time, adult products, used products, refurbished products, and products in closed categories are not eligible for advertising.

t: Amazon brand usage guidelines for 3-party display ads | Amazon Ads
s: Using the Amazon.com name or branding elements can help you get results. Learn more about our brand use guidelines.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.

t: How Amazon’s big private-label business is growing and leaving small brands to protect against knockoffs
s: October 12, 2022 - Amazon continues to invest in private labels such as AmazonBasics, despite accusations that the company copies some of its top-selling third-party products.

t: Amazon to scrap its Go Grocery store branding, close Redmond location | The Seattle Times
s: May 19, 2021 - Amazon is ditching the Amazon Go Grocery brand, closing one of its two Go Grocery stores and rechristening the other under its Amazon Fresh label, a move intended to reduce confusion about its multiple grocery brands.
